2019-27-11.content: Old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

2019-28-11.content: He gives power to the weak and strength to the powerless.

2019-29-11.content: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

2019-30-11.content: When I called, you answered me; you made me bold and stouthearted.

2019-5-12.content: Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

2019-4-12.content: You have been born anew, not from perishable but from imperishable seed, through the living and abiding word of God.

2019-3-12.content: Rejoice always; pray without ceasing; in everything give thanks ...
